channel.title: instance segmentation on Haozheng Lin
channel.description: Recent content in instance segmentation on Haozheng Lin

item.title: Instance Segmentation for Application to Deformable Linear Objects
item.description: Abstract For detecting deformable linear objects (DLO), such as cables, CNN-based methods are insufficient for industrial use, such as for bin-picking tasks. In this paper, based on testing various baseline models from state of the art (s.o.t.a), the reasons for flawless while detecting cables are found and depending on those, we’ve developed a combination of a 2 stage vision Transformer with HTC framework (Fig. 1) as an example to reach the best performance of detecting cable with s.
